Name: Tower of Ascension
About the game: Tower of Ascension is a roguelite tower defense game where you use what you have to survive each node. Gain more relics, towers, abilities, upgrades, and items as you move up the tower to face the ever increasing challenge. Develop Unique Builds Each run gives an assortment of pieces that you need to put together into something that works. Constantly Changing Map No two runs are the same, and that includes the map. Hope for the best but prepare for the worst as you chart your path up the tower. Complex Combat Make a path, place your towers, upgrade your towers, and use abilities and items to overcome battles. Key Features 50+ Towers 40+ Abilities 50+ Tower Upgrades 30+ Relics 30+ Consumable items 20+ Events 20+ Enemies Multiple bosses per act Dozens of unique maps per act
